snippet: The crop had an estimated street value of $3.7 million, and was found in a passageway built during the era of Benito Mussolini, the fascist leader.
lead_paragraph: The crop had an estimated street value of $3.7 million, and was found in a passageway built during the era of Benito Mussolini, the fascist leader.

headline.seo: Police in Rome Seize Marijuana Farm in Tunnel
headline.main: Police in Rome Seize Marijuana Farm Operating in Tunnel
headline.print_headline: Police in Rome Seize Marijuana Farm Operating in Tunnel
